name: Extreme Offroad Racing: 4x4 Mountain Stunts
description:
Have you ever drive the crazy huge monster 4x4 truck? Then get ready to experience the madness of drag racing and destruction battle in Extreme Offroad Racing: Beach Buggy Stunts. Battle through the beach safari tracks on huge monster trucks equipped with modified turbo engines, speed nitro, huge tires, advance weapons etc. And your opponents are the supreme rival monster 4x4 trucks gangs ready to showcase the customized trucks, destroy the opponents and win the extreme destructive rally on beach safari.
In Extreme Offroad Racing: Beach Buggy Stunts you have to race with the crazy rivals monsters trucks gangs, perform amazing stunts, jump through the difficult obstacles in your way, shoot & destroy the opponent tucks and win the extreme monster truck jam race with nonstop action and madness.
Download this Extreme Offroad Racing: Beach Buggy Stunts dirt drag experience with unique extreme sport version of the 4x4 monster truck drag rally and become the undisputed monster truck champion if your territory
Features:
1) Extreme Big 4x4 Monsters Trucks
2) Challenging Tracks and Levels
3) Addictive Game play
4) Amazing Beach Safari Environment
5) Non Stop Entertainment
